original: "Gun.  Sword.  Gunsword.  Screw bayonets, this is way more awesome."
translation: “枪。剑。枪剑。螺丝刀，这是更可怕的方式。”

original: "Nice pistol!  Which trigger fires the flamer?"
translation: “漂亮的手枪！哪一个触发器点燃了火焰？”

original: "Not sure if wielding this thing makes me feel like a bodybuilder or a theoretical physicist.  Both?"
translation: “不知道是挥舞这个东西让我觉得自己是健美运动员还是理论物理学家。两者都有？”

original: "This ain't your grandaddy's .50 cal hand cannon!"
translation: “这不是你爷爷的。50口径手炮！”

original: "Why in the name of fuck did I slap a crossbow on this handgun."
translation: “为什么我以操的名义把弩打在这把手枪上。”

original: .454 6-round speedloader
translation: .454 6轮快速装载机

original: .454 8-round speedloader
translation: .454 8轮快速装载机

original: A long sharp blade, with two powerful .500 S&W Magnum chambers in the hilt.  While chambering big rounds, the barrels are so short it slightly reduces outgoing damage.
translation: 一把锋利的长刃，刀柄上有两个强大的.500 S&W Magnum腔室。在大炮筒的炮膛里，炮筒很短，可以稍微减少射出的伤害。

original: A short but sharp blade, with two powerful .500 S&W Magnum chambers in the grip.  While chambering big rounds, the barrels are so short it slightly reduces outgoing damage.
translation: 一把短而锋利的刀刃，握着两个威力强大的.500 S&W Magnum腔室。在大炮筒的炮膛里，炮筒很短，可以稍微减少射出的伤害。

original: Adds a bunch of rare, fictional weapons.
translation: 添加了一堆罕见的虚构武器。

original: An american-made box magazine, designed to deliver 24 .44 Magnum cartridges to the Eagle 1776.
translation: 一种美国制造的盒式弹匣，设计用于1776年向“鹰”号运送24.44毫米弹匣。

original: Boomlighter 454
translation: 吊杆打火机454

original: DeadLeaves' Fictional Guns
translation: 死人虚构的枪

original: E.M.A.S.
translation: E.M.A.S。

original: Eagle 1776 magazine
translation: 鹰1776弹夹

original: ElectroMagnetic Acceleration System is an array of electromagnets attached to the front of the barrel, accelerating any projectile fired to even higher velocities, increasing damage, recoil and reducing accuracy.
translation: 电磁加速系统是一组电磁铁连接在枪管前部，将任何发射的弹丸加速到更高的速度，增加伤害、反冲和降低精度。

original: FiveO handcannon
translation: 五门手炮

original: Flaregun conversion kit
translation: 火炬转换套件

original: Handmade by master gunsmiths at D&B Minneapolis, this deadly accurate and powerful pistol packs a punch with precision, power and flair.  Comes with a one of a kind integrated flamethrower.
translation: 这款致命的手枪由明尼阿波利斯D&B公司的枪械大师手工制作，精确有力，具有精准、威力和天赋。配有一种一体式火焰喷射器。

original: JHEC M128
translation: 建华M128

original: L.T.  carbine
translation: L.T.卡宾枪

original: M1911 DS
translation: M1911 DS
M919型

original: Manufactured by Sarah and Suhl machine company of Portland, Maine, the M919 submachine gun is the most accurate 9x19mm submachine gun on the market.  Intended for police use, it is fitted with an integral grenade launcher.
translation: M919冲锋枪由美国缅因州波特兰的Sarah和Suhl机器公司制造，是市场上最精确的9x19mm冲锋枪。供警察使用，配有一个完整的榴弹发射器。

original: Replacing several key parts flaregun to convert it to a .40 firearm.  The conversion results in reduced accuracy and increased recoil.
translation: 更换几个关键部件flaregun将其转换为.40火器。这种转换导致精度降低，反冲增加。

original: Someone crazy thought that the .50 BMG belonged in a pistol.  This massive piece of steel proves otherwise.  The sheer bulk however does make it quite adept at smashing face.
translation: 有个疯子认为.50BMG应该放在手枪里。这块大块的钢却证明了这一点。然而，庞大的身躯确实让它非常擅长砸脸。

original: The Johnson Heavy Equipment Co.  M128 autorevolver; all others fail to measure up.  Johnson Heavy Equipment Co.  is a subsidiary of D&B Minneapolis.
translation: 约翰逊重型设备公司M128自动进化机；所有其他都不符合标准。约翰逊重型设备公司是明尼阿波利斯D&B公司的子公司。

original: The Lightning Trail carbine was developed for the riot police to quickly blanket an area with lightning clouds.  While damaging, it is less lethal than live ammunition.
translation: 雷击痕迹卡宾枪是为防暴警察开发的，可以迅速用闪电云覆盖一个地区。虽然具有破坏性，但其杀伤力不如实弹。

original: The M1911 Darkstalker is a very modified M1911, it has a fully integrated crossbow and added rails.  Professional looking with a ebony black finish, laced with lime green details.  Now they will know why they fear the night.  Bat hood sold separately.
translation: M1911暗语者是一个非常改良的M1911，它有一个完全集成的弩和额外的轨道。专业外观与乌木黑色完成，与石灰绿色细节花边。现在他们知道他们为什么害怕黑夜了。蝙蝠帽单独出售。

original: The arc cannon fires bolts of lightning arcing between targets in close proximity to each other.  Originally manufactured to fry insects, now it’s been turned up to fry zombies.
translation: 电弧炮在彼此非常接近的目标之间发射闪电弧。最初是用来炸昆虫的，现在变成了用来炸丧尸的。

original: This genuine Herostratus flamethrower is ideal for light brush clearing and self-defense.
translation: 这种真正的Herostratus喷火机是理想的轻刷清理和自卫。

original: This speedloader can hold 6 rounds of .454 and quickly reload a compatible revolver.
translation: 这个快速装载机可以容纳6发.454子弹，并能快速装载兼容的左轮手枪。

original: This speedloader can hold 8 rounds of .454 and quickly reload a compatible revolver.
translation: 这个快速装载机可以容纳8发.454子弹，并能快速装载兼容的左轮手枪。

original: You see before you a marvel of American engineering: a powerful .44 Magnum submachine gun, made from fine parts assembled in America, including an integral grenade launcher.  Eagle 1776: From the arsenal of freedom!
translation: 在你面前，你会看到一个美国工程的奇迹：一个强大的.44万能冲锋枪，由在美国组装的精细零件制成，包括一个完整的榴弹发射器。鹰1776：来自自由兵工厂！

original: arc cannon
translation: 弧光加农炮

original: gunknife
translation: 枪刀

original: gunknives
translation: 枪刀

original: gunsword
translation: 枪剑

original: integral flamethrower
translation: 整体式火焰喷射器
